resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75058</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75058</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>9149b910-68c8-4c0d-ab79-1538bec52a20#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A csúcs közelében a daraszemek láncai sűrűbben helyezkednek el</string>
            <string language="en">Sleet grains' chains are settled more thickly around the peak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ketten der Schneeregenkörner werden stärker um 
die Spitze vereinbart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les chaînes des grains de verglas sont 
arrangées plus abondamment autour de la crête</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As correntes das grões do sleet são 
estabelecidas mais grossa em torno do pico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le catene dei grani dello sleet sono depositate 
più spesso intorno al picco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αλυσίδες των σιταριών χιονόνερου εγκαθίστανται 
thickly γύρω από την αιχμή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los encadenamientos de los granos del aguanieve se
colocan más grueso alrededor del pico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A csúcshatás szemléltetése</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of point-effect</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">csúcshatás,</string>
            <string language="en">point-effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration des Punkt-Effektes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de point-effet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração do ponto-efeito</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione di punto-effetto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της σημείο-επίδρασης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración del punta-efecto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punkt-Effekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">point-effet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ponto-efeito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">punto-effetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημείο-επίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">punta-efecto</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75058</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

    <item>

  </manifestation>
